name: Flower in the Sky
description:
This game was made for Spring 2D Jam 2022.

Save the plants from getting destroyed by nasty insects and grow the tallest plant possible!

Movement
Left/Right Arrow or A/D: Move Left and Right
Up Arrow, W, Z or Space Bar: Jump
Down Arrow or S: Drop down the leaf
X or Left Mouse button: Attack

Game
Some Insects will come flying towards you and some will crawl up the plants. Make sure you defeat them before they damage you or the Plant's core.

All assets besides the following were created by the developers during the 48-hour jam period:
Font: Panipuri by Khurasan (Free for personal use)
